Quotations.ab: Cf. VrS11.33-37 as it is recited by the rāspīg in the greater celebration of the Āb-zōhr with Drōn Yašt. Vid. N53.30 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003 pp. 256-257):

pad ān ī meh ązasca dužāθrəmca āfrīnāmi aṣ̌əm vohū ẏaθā ahū vairiiō ẏō frabərətō frā.mē mrūte zōt aṣ̌əm vohū ēk-ē rāspīg wāz gīrišn ahurəm mazdąm tā āca manō mata āca ẏazamaide tā varəš́iiamnaca ẏeŋ́hē hātąm tā tā̊scā ẏazamaide.

"In the greater (celebration of the Āb-zōhr), (the rāspīg has to recite) ązasca dužāθrəmca āfrīnāmi, one Aṣ̌əm Vohū and ẏaθā ahū vairiiō ẏō frabərətō frā.mē mrūte. The zōt (has to recite) one Aṣ̌əm Vohū. The rāspīg has to take the wāz and recite (Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003 p. 257 "And the zōt recites:") ahurəm mazdąm (VrS11.33) until āca manō mata āca ẏazamaide (VrS11.34) until varəš́iiamnaca (VrS11.36) ẏeŋ́hē hātąm until yazamaide(VrS11.37). "
